column4: also was wondering whats a good way to benchmark hd write speed since the disk utility is only capable of benching read speeds
dd if=/dev/zero of=test bs=64k count=16k conv=fdatasync is what I use to test my vps speed
that doesn't seem to be verry accurate, it's giving me 107 Mb/sâ€¦ I have a SATA3 SSD my system is booting in about 7 seconds that doesn't make sense
well dude, that's what I use to test speeds of disksw
